commit.message: Do not run the default panic hook inside procedural macros. Fixes #47812

files.patch:
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 error: proc-macro derive panicked
-  --> $DIR/load-panic.rs:16:10
+  --> $DIR/load-panic.rs:17:10
    |
-16 | #[derive(A)]
+17 | #[derive(A)]
    |          ^
    |
    = help: message: nope!
